entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
